Burst of Monster Play Experience

Grants you an amount of Enhanced XP based on your level, doubling the xp that you gain from defeating enemies and completing quests. This increases character XP, Legendary Item XP, and Mounted combat XP. When purchased, enhanced XP is represented by the light blue area on your XP bar. <rgb=#FF0000>Offers no benefit if you are at the level cap.</rgb>

Provides a temporary increase to your movement speed.
Does not affect movement speed while mounted.

Increased Mark gains. <rgb=#FF0000>Does not count on Warband Spoils, token exchanges, quest rewards or deeds.</rgb>
Reduced item wear from combat. Completely nullifies item wear from defeat.
25% Legendary experience gained from defeating enemies is increased (stacks with other Legendary XP bonuses).

Reduced item wear from combat. Completely nullifies item wear from defeat.

Reduced item wear from combat. Completely nullifies item wear from defeat.
Removes the current defeat penalty from Skirmishes.
Instantly cures wounds, poisons, diseases, and fear.
25% experience gained from defeating enemies is increased for 1.5 hours. Also grants an additional 10% XP to Legendary items.
20% experience gained from defeating enemies is increased for 3 hours. Also grants an additional 5% XP to Legendary items.
10% experience gained from defeating enemies is increased for 6 hours. Also grants an additional 5% XP to Legendary items.
Grants you Monster Play Experience and Commendations, temporarily increasing the experience you gain for defeating enemies.
